ConfigurationOption.Value: select wo.wonum, wo.status, sd.maxvalue maxstatus, wo.description, (select ldtext from longdescription where ldkey = wo.workorderid and ldownertable = 'WORKORDER' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') ldtext, wo.location, (select l.description from locations l where l.location = wo.location and l.siteid = wo.siteid) locdescription, wo.assetnum, (select a.description from asset a where a.assetnum = wo.assetnum and a.siteid = wo.siteid) assetdescription, wo.wopriority, wo.worktype, wo.lead, wo.supervisor, wo.crewid, wo.owner, wo.reportdate, wo.reportedby, wo.schedstart, wo.failurecode, wo.problemcode, wo.glaccount, wo.parent, wo.haschildren, wo.woclass, wo.origrecordid, wo.origrecordclass, wo.siteid, wo.orgid, wo.workorderid from workorder wo join synonymdomain sd on wo.status = sd.value and sd.domainid = 'WOSTATUS' where wo.historyflag = 0 and wo.istask = 0 and sd.maxvalue not in ( 'CAN', 'CLOSE', 'HISTEDIT' )

Struct._value: := test( ${OPEN_LABOR_WORKORDER_ID} is null, '', 'Working on: ' || query( 'Work Orders', 'Work Order', 'workorderid = ${OPEN_LABOR_WORKORDER_ID}' ) || ' - ' || query( 'Work Orders', 'Description', 'workorderid = ${OPEN_LABOR_WORKORDER_ID}' ) )
:= localQuery( "Labor Reporting", "workorderid", " Labor = ${MX_LABOR_CODE} and 'Finish Time' is null and 'Regular Hours' is null " )

List.ListEntry: := query( "Failure Codes", "Failure List", " 'Failure Code' = ${Failure Code} and Parent is null ")

ConfigurationOption.Value: Do you want to mark the work order as complete?

EventAction.Condition: ${Location} is not null and ${Asset} is not null and query( 'Assets', 'Location', 'Asset = ${Asset}' ) != ${Location}

ConfigurationOption.Value: The work order requires a description!
Create a followup or new record?

Struct.Enabled: !${OPEN_LABOR_WORKORDER_ID} and ${workorderid} is not null and ${Maximo Status} <> 'COMP'
